articles.title: Injury news: Gerard Piqué and Sergi Roberto - FC Barcelona
articles.description: Barça's No.3 has a grade 3 sprain in the internal lateral ligament and partial injury to the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee, while the No.20 has a rupture in the femoral rectus of his right thigh.
